name: Looking for cold girls
description:
In this world, materials are in short supply. You must gather enough supplies if you want to escape. There are a total of 24 different props distributed throughout the scene. Each time you find an item, you will earn some gold, of course, even if you do not find a short time, your Allies will regularly give you some gold. Every 100 gold you collect unlocks one girl CG. There are 15 different girls. Come and join the maze search.



Game Features:
♦ National wind scene, beautiful scenery.
♦ Friendly interface, beautiful music.
♦ Lots of props. A stronger challenge.
♦ Beautiful girl, always available to view.

Game play:
♦ WSAD move character, space bar jump, mouse control perspective.
♦ The button in the upper left corner of the game can bring up the girl button, click the button to unlock and view the girl CG.
♦ The button in the lower right corner of the game can call up the search state of the current item.
